2.caption: 1944 Major League Baseball All-Star Game
2.description: The 1944 Major League Baseball All-Star Game was the 12th playing of the "Midsummer Classic" between Major League Baseball's American League (AL) and National League (NL) All-Star teams. The All-Star Game was held on July 11, 1944 at Forbes Field in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, the home of the NL's Pittsburgh Pirates.
2.inspected:Radio announcers: Don Dunphy, Bill Slater and Bill Corum
